name: Biospecimen Tracking
description: Helps manage the tracking of specimens to boxes, using specific configurations and validation based on the box type.

sub_settings.name:
Project Selection

Projects used must all be unique, meaning they cannot be used in more than one configuration - doing so will trigger error messages in any projects impacted by the re-use.

General Configuration

All configurations in this section are required for the module to behave correctly. Any missing values will almost certainly cause the module to error when used.

Box Name: The regular expression necessary for pulling out the various components from the box's [box_name] field. The following is a list of all allowable named capture groups that are currently coded/used within validation.
  • box_type
  • sample_type
  • aliquot_number
  • visit
  • box_number
Example: /^(?<box_type>00|[A-Z]{2})(?<sample_type>[a-z]{5})(?<aliquot_number>[0-9]{2})(-V)(?<visit>[0-9]{3})(-BX)(?<box_number>[0-9]{3})$/

Specimen Name: The regular expression necessary for pulling out the various components from the specimen's [name] field. The following is a list of all allowable named capture groups that are currently coded/used within validation.
  • year
  • participant_id
  • visit
  • sample_type
  • aliquot_number
Example: /^(?<year>[0-9]{2})(-)(V)(?<participant_id>[0-9]{4})(-v)(?<visit>[0-9]{2})(?<sample_type>[a-zA-Z]{2})(?<aliquot_number>[0-9]{2})$/

Optional Configurations

The following configurations are all optional. Anything in this section can either add additional features or override existing default behaviors.

Preferred datetime format instead of the raw [yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm] database format. This value will be used in the specimen list on the main dashboard. Provided format MUST match Luxon date format requirements.

See Luxon Documentation for required format.

Override the maximum allowed time, in [MINUTES], between collected and processed dates, before a warning is given.

  • Must be numeric and greater than zero.
  • Default value: 1080 (18 hours)
Leave this empty to use the default value

Mixed '00' Temporary Box Configuration

A special box type that has unique requirements/validations for the team this was built for at Marshfield. Other sites may not find this special box type useful.
Will this configuration be utilizing the special 'Temporary' box type?  Leave unchecked to ignore.
The total number of expected visits per participant. Will be ignored if the previous checkbox was left unchecked.
The total number of specimens collected from the participant PER VISIT. Will be ignored if the previous checkbox was left unchecked.
